summary: Resolved conflicts in .claude-output.json, index.html, and style.css. Kept HEAD PR metadata for .claude-output.json (filter bar PR #24). Merged HTML by preserving origin/main's CSP meta tag, accessibility improvements (autocomplete='off', aria-label on grid), and using year-range-label class consistently. Merged CSS by taking origin/main's polished filter-bar styles (per-element focus states, hidden spinners, green reset button) while adding min-height to results-count from HEAD to prevent layout shift.
strategyUsed: kept HEAD for .claude-output.json (current PR metadata); merged index.html and style.css preferring origin/main's improved accessibility and styling while retaining HEAD's justify-content:center for filter bar and min-height for results count; used year-range-label class name consistently across HTML and CSS
